title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: On linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000).When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label. However, so does the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X). If it starts moving around, I think users will get confused.
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items (including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) move below the label.
EB: The tool items (such as the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) should remain on the same line as the label, regardless of how small the view gets.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the tool items (including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) move below the label.
